sources.title: Le théâtre électrique de Bob
sources.description: Three young children set up a table, and on the table is placed a miniature stage. The stage curtain opens, a carpet appears, and then the carpet unrolls by itself. Two puppet figures then come out and begin to perform a series of routines. ORIGINAL TITLE Le théâtre électrique de Bob (S) YEAR 1909 DIRECTOR Segundo de Chomón SCREENWRITER Ferdinand Zecca COMPOSER Silent Movie CINEMATOGRAPHER B&W Country: France Language: French Release Date: April 1906 (USA) USA 18 October 1909 (re-release) Also Known As (AKA) Le théâtre de Bob France (original title) Bob's Electric Theatre USA (reissue title) El teatro de Bob Spain Le théâtre électrique de Bob Finland (reissue title) Miniature Theatre USA Production Co: Pathé Frères Runtime: 5 min Sound Mix: Silent Color: Black and White Re-issue Color: Color; Hand-Color
